Is it possible that you need a cracked version of Steam running to save the game? It doesn't save at all... It's nice to have the game on PC though!!! =) So thank you for that. I have been checking up on this game a week before August 1st... Seeing how you were the first, I got it to try it. It works, very nice. Easy to change resolution and graphic settings. My Acer Aspire laptop has a single core 1.6 ghz processor with ATI Radeon 3200 graphics card, 3 GB ram and I can run it smooth on 800x600 at Low settings... Which yes sucks, but surprisingly the game looks amazing still! I will report back if I figure out the saving method.
